World.Name: Levi
World.Entry: December, 1050: Levi learns all about the creation story January, 1051: Levi learns how to hold a breath February, 1051: Levi learns which way is North April, 1051: Levi can loot items from a corpse May, 1051: Levi understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals June, 1051: Levi learns to open doors that aren't locked July, 1051: Levi is in Lockpick Training and practicing existing skills
